entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Coronach
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:29 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Coronach 09:00 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023
Temperature: -7.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -8.4°C
Wind: NE 42 km/h gust 56 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 8 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 8 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow ending early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023
